level.text: If a facility or program discontinues a service provision, the facility or program shall apply for and obtain a new certification from the Department before resuming operations.

level.heading: SOURCE
level.text: Final Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 9341 (November 24, 2000), adopting Emergency and Proposed Rulemaking published at 47 DCR 7708, 7719 (September 22, 2000).
